title: #403: House of Hammer - Part 4
description:
We finish our coverage of the Discovery plus docs-series  “House of Hammer” and re-focus on Armie Hammer’s aunt, Casey as well as on the terrible legacy of her grandfather, Armand Hammer. 

Jim and Laura explain why Casey Hammer would have remained so attached to her father Julian Hammer, despite his relentless abuse of her and her mother. Laura describes the conflicting nature of complex post traumatic stress.  Lisa shows Jim and Laura a recent clip from Saturday Night Live which attempted to scathingly satirize Armie Hammer’s behavior, but did it inadvertently make his victims the butt of the joke?

#houseofhammer #caseyhammer  #armiehammer #domesticviolenceawarenessmonth #discoveryplus #VictimsMatter #GenerationalAbuse
